scripts.export: shx rm -rf ./project && npx n8n export:workflow --backup --output ./project/workflows && npx n8n export:credentials --backup --output ./project/credentials
scripts.import: dotenv cross-env N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY=%N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY% && npx n8n import:credentials --separate --input ./project/credentials && npx n8n import:workflow --separate --input ./project/workflows
scripts.do-pull: dotenv cross-var git clone %REPO_PULL_URL% ./temp && cd ./temp && git checkout main && (shx cp -r ./project ./../project) && cd .. && shx rm -rf ./temp
scripts.pull: shx rm -rf ./project && shx rm -rf ./temp && npm run do-pull
scripts.do-push: cd ./project && git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-generated commit' && git push --force --set-upstream origin main
scripts.push: cd ./project && git init && dotenv cross-var git config user.email %REPO_PUSH_AUTHOR% && (dotenv cross-var git remote set-url origin %REPO_PUSH_URL% || dotenv cross-var git remote add origin %REPO_PUSH_URL%) && npm run do-push
scripts.export-push: npm run export && npm run push
scripts.pull-import: npm run pull && npm run import
scripts.n8n: dotenv cross-env N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY=%N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY% && cross-env EXECUTIONS_DATA_PRUNE=true && cross-env EXECUTIONS_DATA_MAX_AGE=168 && cross-env N8N_USER_MANAGEMENT_DISABLED=true && n8n start
